#include<map>
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,k,i,l;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		l=0;
		string str,a;
		map<string,int>count;
		k=0;
		cin>>a;
		for(k=0;k<a.length();k++)
		{
			for(i=0;(i+k)<a.length();i++)
			{
				str.append(a,i,k+1);
				count[str]++;
				str="";
			}
		}
		map<string,int>::iterator j;
		for(j=count.begin();j!=count.end();j++)
		l++;
		printf("%d\n",l);
		count.clear();
	}
}
